briefTitle: A Study of Neratinib Plus Capecitabine Versus Lapatinib Plus Capecitabine in Patients With HER2+ Metastatic Breast Cancer Who Have Received Two or More Prior HER2 Directed Regimens in the Metastatic Setting
officialTitle: A STUDY OF NERATINIB PLUS CAPECITABINE VERSUS LAPATINIB PLUS CAPECITABINE IN PATIENTS WITH HER2+ METASTATIC BREAST CANCER WHO HAVE RECEIVED TWO OR MORE PRIOR HER2-DIRECTED REGIMENS IN THE METASTATIC SETTING (NALA)
summary: This is a randomized, multi-center, multinational, open-label, active-controlled, parallel design study of the combination of neratinib plus capecitabine versus the combination of lapatinib plus capecitabine in HER2+ MBC patients who have received two or more prior HER2 directed regimens in the metastatic setting.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From randomization date to recurrence, progression or death, assessed up to 38 months. The result is based on primary analysis data cut.
